version_description:
- Bug fix for Tips tab (text clipping)
- Total kills added to stats
- News feed added (updates once a day)

- Stats will now display more banners (please read instructions)
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Very minor changes to some text throughout the app.
- Notification setting added
- Increased stats timer (main put bacon at 30s) (this timer isnâ€™t to help with all the hundreds of requests)

- Reduced Stats Count Down Timer
- Added The New Legend
- iOS 10 and older users won't receive updates anymore. Updates are only available for iOS 11 and up now.

- Updated all of the weapons
- Maps have also received an update
- Minor UI changes

More coming soon
- The Player Stats Tab bugs have been taken care of.

-Bug fix for broken navigation bar on some devices
-Added season 3 maps
-Added new legend
-Adjusted weapon damage changes
-Added new weapon
-Stats tab is working now

Coming Soon:
-Stats for recent matches
- Fixed Stats tab bug that caused some users to not be found

- Stats bug where gamertag with a space/special character would cause data to not be called
- Added the ability to turn off animations for Stats Tab and the Weapons Tab

Instructions for disabling app animations:
1.) Be in the main menu
2.) Tap the three dots in the top right corner
3.) Tap on Settings
4.) Disable "App Animations" by making sure the switch shows no red

Thanks for all the feedback!

- Bug fixes for Stats Tab
- UI has been changed a little

- Changes for Season 4 (more coming soon)
- Fixed stats tab bugs (caused crashing)

The Season 8 Update is here!
-New blog feed
-Revised weapons tab (with more information)
-Revised maps tab
-Dark and Light mode support is here as well
As well as some other cool stuff. So much more will be coming soon and thanks to all of you for the continued support.

-Change colors for subtitles on blog feed
-Added Legends Decider tab (thank you for your feedback)
